item.description:
This will be the very first Meetup for Western Mass 9/11 Truth! We'll use the time to get to know each other, talk about current issues in the 9/11 Truth movement, and plan local actions in public education about this critical issue, including a public speakout starting at noon at the Federal Building in Springfield on the anniversary, 9/11/06, continuing until about 6 pm, to catch people as they leave work. We'll also plan the evening event for September 11th, which will happen at First Churches in Northampton, beginning at 7pm. The event will include one or more film clips about 9/11, plus speakers and Q & A.

Our next meetings are as follows:
Tuesdays -- 6:30 to 9:30pm
August 22 - Bangs Community Center, Amherst
August 29 - Media Education Foundation, Noho
Sept... 05 - Media Education Foundation, Noho

Info about these 9/11 Truth meetings plus other important info can be found at www.flybynews.com. If you have any questions, please email the organizers, Stephen Goodale and Jonathan Mark at: westernmass911truth@yahoo.com.
item.name: Western Mass 9/11 Truth Meetup
